results.title: Simvastatin does not alleviate muscle pathology in a mouse model of Duchenne muscular dystrophy
results.text_hl: Of note, even an increased rate of @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrosis@@@ was found in @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-treated mdx @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin Prevents Liver Microthrombosis and Sepsis Induced Coagulopathy in a Rat Model of Endotoxemia
results.text_hl: We also tested the efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to prevent these changes and @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrosis@@@ of the @DISEASE_Liver_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@liver@@@ in association with the maintenance of TM expression in sinusoidal endothelial cells.

results.title: A remarkable in vitro cytotoxic, cell cycle arresting and proapoptotic characteristics of low-dose mixed micellar simvastatin combined with alendronate sodium.
results.text_hl: Further, the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SVS@@@ + ADS MM treatment significantly inhibited the cell multiplication in the S phase and resulted in high % of late apoptotic and @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrotic@@@ cells at low concentration (0.05 and 0.15 mug/mL) as compared other test samples.

results.title: Simvastatin Impairs the Inflammatory and Repair Phases of the Postinjury Skeletal Muscle Regeneration
results.text_hl: This result confirmed that the final level of @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrosis@@@ was reached on day 10 in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@-treated group.

results.title: Differential effects of simvastatin on mesangial cells.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: Most of the cellular effects of the lipophilic statins occurred within the same time and concentration range, suggesting a common molecular mechanism. Only apoptosis and @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrosis@@@ were observed at later time points or with higher concentrations of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and thus seem to be secondary to the changes in gene expression and alterations of the actin cytoskeleton.

citations.NLM: Heusinger-Ribeiro J, Fischer B, Goppelt-Struebe M. Differential effects of simvastatin on mesangial cells. Kidney Int. 2004 Jul;66(1):187-95. PMID: 15200425

results.title: HMG-CoA reductase inhibition causes increased necrosis and apoptosis in an in vivo mouse glioblastoma multiforme model.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Low-dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ increased @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrosis@@@ and apoptosis compared to both control and high-dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ groups.

results.title: Experimental simvastatin-induced myopathy in rabbits.
results.text_hl: After oral administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (50 mg/kg/day) for 2 weeks, serum CK was elevated in 5 of 7 @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@; degenerating or @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrotic@@@ fibers were seen in 3 @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@.

citations.NLM: Nakahara K, Kuriyama M, Yoshidome H, Nagata K, Nagado T, Nakagawa M, Arimura K, Higuchi I, Osame M. Experimental simvastatin-induced myopathy in rabbits. J Neurol Sci. 1992 Nov;113(1):114-7. PMID: 1469449

results.title: Apoptosis contributes to septic cardiomyopathy and is improved by simvastatin therapy.
results.text_hl: Pretreatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ protected against alpha-toxin-induced @DISEASE_Sepsis @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@ associated with reduced @GENE_P53_PS @GENE_301300 @@@p53@@@, @GENE_TNF @GENE_24835 @@@TNF-alpha@@@, apoptosis, and @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrosis@@@.
